title: Agnus Dei
lyrics: Ha – le – lu – ja … Ha – le – lu – ja,
is die He – re, Al – mag – tig!
Waardig is die Heer, waardig is die Heer.
U is hei – lig, hei – lig
is die He – re, Al – mag – tig!
Waardig is die Heer, waardig is die Heer.
chords: G C/G G G C/G D/G C/G
Am G/B C Am G/B C
Am G/B C Am G/B C
raw_text:
Agnus Dei
Michael W. Smith
Verse
G C/G G G C/G D/G C/G
Ha – le – lu – ja … Ha – le – lu – ja,
D/G C/G G
want die Here Almagtige heers. [x2]
G C/G D/G C/G
Ha – le – lu – ja,
Chorus
C/G D/G G D/G G
hei – lig, hei – lig
C/G G Em D
is die He – re, Al – mag – tig!
Am G/B C Am G/B C
Waardig is die Heer, waardig is die Heer.
G D/G G
U is hei – lig, hei – lig
C/G G Em D
is die He – re, Al – mag – tig!
Am G/B C Am G/B C
Waardig is die Heer, waardig is die Heer.
C D/C G
A – men.
